Title: Trump can circumvent the law introduced under Biden that complica...
Description: Trump can bypass a law introduced under Biden that complicates the process of US withdrawal from NATO, Politico newspaper reports. In 2023, the US passed a law according to which the president's decision to withdraw the country from NATO must be approved by a two-thirds vote of the Senate or authorized by an act of Congress. However, according to American legal experts, Trump may try to use the provision of exclusive presidential powers in the field of foreign policy.
